entry.title: Love, Actually, Is Clark Kent
entry.summary:
Author: Ungie

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,130Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: Bruce Wayne isn’t new to dating—but he’s used to partners who want him for his money, his name, or the attention that comes with being Gotham’s favorite billionaire. So when he starts dating Clark Kent, he assumes it’ll be more of the same. But Clark isn’t like the others.
